comments: Liked the class and teacher but grading was not what I expected. Uses rubrics but she liked papers that didn\'t follow the rubric more. Seemed to have a hard time remembering what she tells the class regarding assignments, changes mid class.

She is a great teacher, young and always seems happy. You read a lot, write one response to reading per week which isn\'t that bad! The quizzes are easy if you do the reading it is common sense. Great discussions in class when people actually participate, which for her is kind of a requirement. I would take her again if needed.

She was very helpful, and really knew what she was talking about when going over the books. She is one of my favorite teachers. She\'s young and has personality. You MUST read the book (no sparknotes), and go to class because she gives quizzes which aren\'t hard. The writing isn\'t that bad. And the books are interesting. TAKE HER!!

Her class is very interesting and she is very nice but her grading is out of control. When you go to conferences with her make sure you ask what you need to do to get an A on the paper, because otherwise she will say she loves it and tehn give you a C.
do not take her. she was not helpful at all. english 101 should not be graded that hard. noone got above a b on papers
